definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Kim countryman from the Yellow River basin is the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 金鄉人源於黃河流域，是炎黃子孫。

sentences.english: The Chu armies gradually intruded into the Yellow River Basin.
sentences.chinese: 楚兩軍逐漸侵入黃河流域。

sentences.english: The Yellow River basin in China is the birthplace of the world was.
sentences.chinese: 我國黃河流域是世界蠶業的發源地。

sentences.english: Yu of the Xia Dynasty exploited the road towards civilization in the Huanghe River Basin.
sentences.chinese: 夏禹的功業，據說開闢了黃河流域邁向文明的道路。

sentences.english: It was these three legendary individuals that began the development of civilization in the Yellow River basin .
sentences.chinese: 這是這三個著名的個人，開始了文明發展的黃河流域。

sentences.english: The Yellow River valley is one of the important birthplace of china's ancient civilization.
sentences.chinese: 黃河流域是中華古文明的重要發祥地之一。

sentences.english: Potentiality and Strategy of Municipal Sewage Reuse for Agricultural Irrigation in Yellow River Valley.
sentences.chinese: 黃河流域城鎮生活污水回用農業的潛力和對策。

sentences.english: There are two kinds of sampling environments for dendrochronological study.
sentences.chinese: 黃河流域存在着兩類不同的樹木年輪取樣環境。

sentences.english: Finally, the model is applied to the Yellow River basin to verify its effectiveness and feasibility.
sentences.chinese: 結合黃河流域實例驗證了該模型的合理可行性。

sentences.english: In the ancient time near the Yellow River, there was a tribe. Its leader called Yan Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 在遠古的黃河流域，有一個部落的首領叫炎帝。

sentences.english: The place where typography was probably invented in our country was the Huanghe river region.
sentences.chinese: 我國發明版築技術的地區應該是黃河流域。

definition: Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
Tongchuan prefecture level city in Shaanxi
Qi county in Hebi 鶴壁|鹤壁[He4 bi4], Henan
Sanmenxia prefecture level city in Henan
Sixteen Kingdoms of Five non-Han people (ruling most of China 304-439)/also written 五胡十六國|五胡十六国
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
Hancheng city and county in Shaanxi
